entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Avoid boxing ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull arguments in Tier-0 #104512
  • System.TypeLoadException When Interface Type Contains Static Field/Property for Derived Struct Type #104511
  • Changes in the code while its process is running #104509
  • XPathNavigator.TypedValue fails to return normalized values in the value space of XSD xs:string subtypes like xs:normalizedString, xs:token, xs:language, xs:Name #104507
  • [NativeAOT] Intermittent crash accessing thread statics on Windows Arm64 #104500
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Use of "Repeat" seems incorrect #104495
  • System.Numerics.Complex Parse (string s, IFormatProvider? provider) don't work #104421
  • [BUG] typeof statements for types nested within generic types are incosistent #104510
  • `Debug.Assert(_readAheadTaskStatus == ReadAheadTask_CompletionReserved);` failure in HttpConnection #104491
  • [mono][wasm] wasm interop tracking #95084
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Get ThreadContext for AVX registers #104514
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Use IndexOfAnyExcept in BigInteger.IsPowerOfTwo #104513
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for `Int128` ↔`UInt128` operators #104506
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 docs #104505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-staging] [LibraryImportGenerator] Use basic forwarder in down-level support if any parameters can't be marshalled #104501
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix an issue with complex number parsing #104499
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics

Merged

  • Fix stackoverflow message for repeated frames #104508
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Update readAheadTask asserts in HttpConnection #104496
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Add nativeaot support on LoongArch64. #103889
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.ConditionalExtract* APIs #104150
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Delete some unused HRESULT macro definitions #104484
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix an issue with complex number parsing #104388
    area-System.Numerics

Updated

  • Convert Array.IsSimpleCopy and CanAssignArray type to managed #104103
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable TLS on linux/arm64 only for static resolver #104408
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add some helper functions for getting the intrinsic ID to use for a given oper #104498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [build.ps1] Set the default architecture using an environment variable #104474
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update EOL versions (8.0-staging) #103393
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update-eol-versions-6.0-staging #103380
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update EOL versions (main) #103379
    area-Infrastructure
  • Have mono handle the vector as APIs that grow or shrink the vector type #104445
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2489660 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Activities for Http Connections, Dns, Sockets and SslStream #103922
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeout for tracing/eventcounter/runtimecounters #104461
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Reduce allocations in Quic/HTTP3 #104394
    area-System.Net.Quic, 9.0.0
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Enable "Allocate on stack" for NAOT/R2R #104411
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Re-try when browser's WBT fail with `System.TimeoutException` #104481
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] Failed to download Cpp2IL #42003

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix detection of torn SDK #41907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use PackageDownload in torn builds #41951
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Fix duplicate endpoints when resolving referenced asset endpoints #41995
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Permit loose manifest priority #41996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Typing a quote character after `new` inserts two quotes. #74162

Updated

  • Add public APIs for FixAll functionality for CodeRefactorings #60703
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix leading comments not being preserved on variable case #74278
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove (already disabled) command handlers related to 'add suppression' menu command. #74266
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Escape `record` keywords #74227
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, json #56658
  • Add a feature to Server-driven, client-rendered applications just like Hybirdly. #56657
  • PolicyEvaluator doesn't have correct logic #56656

Closed

  • InvalidOperationException: EditForm requires either a Model parameter, or an EditContext parameter ... - Caused by Using a Poco in different assembly that has public fields instead of auto-properties #56627
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #56653
  • Perf regression: plaintext #56654
  • Question: How to detect whether the current app is a normal ASP.NET Core application or a Blazor app? #56633
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #56651

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.csproj #56659
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Updated

  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException Throw methods in SendFileResponseExtensions..CheckRange #56420
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Removing unsafe parts of Decode method in QueryStringEnumerable #56630
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add an IsVisible Property to <Span> Elements #23470

Closed

  • BackButtonBehavior IsVisible="False" does not hide the back button on iOS #23424
  • [iOS]BackButtonBehavior IsEnabled="False" does not Disable the back button on iOS #5195
    Backlog
  • [iOS, Preview 4 and 5] iOS build fails with MessagingRemoteException in UnpackLibraryResources when connected to Mac #23440
  • [iOS] Tap gesture recognizer fires tap event for a label when the label is disabled #23453

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9] BackButtonBehavior enhancement - Changed IsVisible & IsEnabled BindingMode to OneWay #23467
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Add analyzer for TestCase and missing Category #23465
    area-testing

Merged

  • Move PopLifeCycle to device tests #23468
  • Bump to 8.0.80 #23469
  • Shell BackButtonBehavior improvement #23466
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Added missing ui test categories #23464
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing

Updated

  • Null guard in `ShellFlyoutTemplatedContentRenderer.HeaderContainer.UpdateMinimumHeight` #16573
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area-layout, area-drawing, community ✨, .NET 8 SR8
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • [Windows] Respect `ClearButtonVisibility = ClearButtonVisibility.Never` for `<Entry>`s #23158
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Supporting OUTER APPLY for aggregate queries #34173

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement `CASE` flattening optimizations #34175
  • Improve `String_Contains_Column` test #34174

Updated

  • Cosmos: Stop nesting results in extra JSON object #34044
  • Avoid duplicating complex expression in comparisons #34172
  • Translate COALESCE as ISNULL #34171
  • [WIP] Translation of TimeOnly.FromTimeSpan on SQL Server no-op #34114
  • Add UnsafeAccessor support for generic types #34146
